name: Glorp Web!!
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
